message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a great deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  I'm not at liberty to disclose all the details at this time, but I can assure you it's worth a significant investment.  My price for the product is $2000000. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I'll be moving forward with another buyer.
